thread.title: Bayern Munich v Arsenal: Pictures show Arsene Wenger NOT keeping off the grass | Metro News
thread.title_full: Bayern Munich v Arsenal: Pictures show Arsene Wenger NOT keeping off the grass | Metro News

author: Metro Sport Reporter For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Bayern Munich v Arsenal: Pictures show Arsene Wenger NOT keeping off the grass | Metro News

organizations.name: metro news metro sport reporter for metro.co.uk

text:
Metro Sport Reporter for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 15 Feb 2017 8:02 am They see me rollin’, they hatin’ (Picture: Getty) 
Arsenal shared a photograph on their official Snapchat page of Arsene Wenger breaking the rules before their Champions League clash with Bayern Munich had even kicked off. ‘How can Gibbs be captain?!’ Man Utd legend Roy Keane TEARS into Arsenal flops 
The Gunners head to the Allianz Arena after losing two of their last three matches and Wenger will be looking for every possible advantage over the Bundesliga giants leading up to kick-off. 
Bayern have won ten of their last 11 matches in all competitions and will be confident of a result against Wenger’s men on Wednesday evening. 
On Tuesday night, pictures of the Frenchman show him strolling out onto the pitch to inspect… like a boss. Thug life (Picture: Snapchat) 
However, the signs appear to instruct Wenger and Co. to keep off the grass – perhaps it’s just his latest, more innovative, attempt at mind games. 
We’re almost certain no steward would have had the balls to coax the 67-year-old from the pitch ahead of such an important game for the north London outfit.
